verses.verse: Again the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, speak <WH1696> to the sons <WH1121> of your people <WH5971>, and say <WH559> unto them <WH935>, When I bring the sword <WH2719> upon a land <WH776>, if the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> take <WH3947> a <WH259> man <WH376> of their coasts <WH7097>, and set <WH5414> him for their watchman <WH6822>:
If when he sees <WH7200> the sword <WH2719> come <WH935> upon the land <WH776>, he blows <WH8628> the trumpet <WH7782>, and warns <WH2094> the people <WH5971>;

Then whoever <WH8085> hears <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782>, and takes not warning <WH2094>; if the sword <WH2719> comes <WH935>, and takes him away <WH3947>, his blood <WH1818> shall be upon his own head <WH7218>.

He heard <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782>, and took not warning <WH2094>; his blood <WH1818> shall be upon him <WH2094>. But he that takes warning shall deliver <WH4422> his soul <WH5315>.

But if the watchman <WH6822> sees <WH7200> the sword <WH2719> come <WH935>, and blows <WH8628> not the trumpet <WH7782>, and the people <WH5971> are not warned <WH2094>; if the sword <WH2719> comes <WH935>, and takes <WH3947> any person <WH5315> from among them <WH3947>, he is taken away in his iniquity <WH5771>; but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1875> at the watchman <WH6822>'s hand <WH3027>.

So you <WH1121>, O son of man <WH120>, I have set <WH5414> you a watchman <WH6822> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>; therefore you shall hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> at my mouth <WH6310>, and warn them from me <WH2094>.

When I say <WH559> unto the wicked <WH7563>, O wicked <WH7563> man <WH4191>, you shall surely die <WH4191>; if you do not speak <WH1696> to warn <WH2094> the wicked <WH7563> from his way <WH1870>, that wicked <WH7563> man shall die <WH4191> in his iniquity <WH5771>; but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1245> at your hand <WH3027>.

Nevertheless <WH2094>, if you warn the wicked <WH7563> of his way <WH1870> to turn <WH7725> from it <WH7725>; if he do not turn from his way <WH1870>, he shall die <WH4191> in his iniquity <WH5771>; but you have delivered <WH5337> your soul <WH5315>.

Therefore <WH1121>, O you son of man <WH120>, speak <WH559> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>; Thus you speak <WH559>, saying <WH559>, If our transgressions <WH6588> and our sins <WH2403> are upon us <WH4743>, and we pine away in them <WH2421>, how should we then live?

Say <WH559> unto them <WH2416>, As I live, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>, I have no pleasure <WH2654> in the death <WH4194> of the wicked <WH7563>; but that the wicked <WH7563> turn <WH7725> from his way <WH1870> and live <WH2421>: turn <WH7725> you <WH7725>, turn you from your evil <WH7451> ways <WH1870>; for why will you die <WH4191>, O house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>?

Therefore <WH1121>, son of man <WH120>, say <WH559> unto the sons <WH1121> of your people <WH5971>, The righteousness <WH6666> of the righteous <WH6662> shall not deliver <WH5337> him in the day <WH3117> of his transgression <WH6588>: as for the wickedness <WH7564> of the wicked <WH7563>, he shall not fall <WH3782> thereby in the day <WH3117> that he turns <WH7725> from his wickedness <WH7562>; neither shall the righteous <WH6662> be able <WH3201> to live <WH2421> for his righteousness in the day <WH3117> that he sins <WH2398>.

When I shall say <WH559> to the righteous <WH6662>, that he shall surely <WH2421> live <WH2421>; if he trust <WH982> to his own righteousness <WH6666>, and commit <WH6213> iniquity <WH5766>, all his righteousnesses <WH6666> shall not be remembered <WH2142>; but for his iniquity <WH5766> that he has committed <WH6213>, he shall die for it <WH4191>.

Again <WH559>, when I say unto the wicked <WH7563>, You shall surely <WH4191> die <WH4191>; if he turn <WH7725> from his sin <WH2403>, and do <WH6213> that which is lawful <WH4941> and right <WH6666>;

If the wicked <WH7563> restore <WH7725> the pledge <WH2258>, give again <WH7999> that he had robbed <WH1500>, walk <WH1980> in the statutes <WH2708> of life <WH2416>, without committing <WH6213> iniquity <WH5766>; he shall surely <WH2421> live <WH2421>, he shall not die <WH4191>.

None of his sins <WH2403> that he has committed <WH2398> shall be mentioned <WH2142> unto him <WH6213>: he has done that which is lawful <WH4941> and right <WH6666>; he shall surely <WH2421> live <WH2421>.
Yet the sons <WH1121> of your people <WH5971> say <WH559>, The way <WH1870> of the Lord <WH136> is not equal <WH8505>: but as for them <WH1870>, their way is not equal <WH8505>.
When the righteous <WH6662> turns <WH7725> from his righteousness <WH6666>, and commits <WH6213> iniquity <WH5766>, he shall even die thereby <WH4191>.
But if the wicked <WH7563> turn <WH7725> from his wickedness <WH7564>, and do <WH6213> that which is lawful <WH4941> and right <WH6666>, he shall live thereby <WH2421>.
Yet you say <WH559>, The way <WH1870> of the Lord <WH136> is not equal <WH8505>. O you house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, I will judge <WH8199> you every one <WH376> after his ways <WH1870>.

And it came to pass in the twelfth <WH8147> year <WH8141> of our captivity <WH1546>, in the tenth <WH6224> month <WH2568>, in the fifth day of the month <WH2320>, that one that had escaped <WH6412> out of Jerusalem <WH3389> came <WH935> unto me <WH559>, saying, The city <WH5892> is struck <WH5221>.

Now the hand <WH3027> of the Lord <WH3068> was upon me in the evening <WH6153>, before <WH6440> he that was escaped <WH6412> came <WH935>; and had opened <WH6605> my mouth <WH6310>, until he came <WH935> to me in the morning <WH1242>; and my mouth <WH6310> was opened <WH6605>, and I was no more mute <WH481>.
Then the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, they that inhabit <WH3427> those wastes <WH2723> of the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478> speak <WH559>, saying <WH559>, Abraham <WH85> was one <WH259>, and he inherited <WH3423> the land <WH776>: but we are many <WH7227>; the land <WH776> is given <WH5414> us for inheritance <WH4181>.

Therefore say <WH559> unto them <WH559>, Thus says the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; You eat <WH398> with the blood <WH1818>, and lift up <WH5375> your eyes <WH5869> toward your idols <WH1544>, and shed <WH8210> blood <WH1818>: and shall you possess <WH3423> the land <WH776>?

You stand <WH5975> upon your sword <WH2719>, you work <WH6213> abomination <WH8441>, and you defile <WH2930> every one <WH376> his neighbors <WH7453> wife <WH802>: and shall you possess <WH3423> the land <WH776>?

Say <WH559> you thus unto them <WH559>, Thus says the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; As I live <WH2416>, surely they that are in the wastes <WH2723> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>, and him that is in the open <WH6440> field <WH7704> will I give <WH5414> to the animals <WH2416> to be devoured <WH398>, and they that be in the forts <WH4679> and in the caves <WH4631> shall die <WH4191> of the pestilence <WH1698>.

For I will lay <WH5414> the land <WH776> most <WH4923> desolate <WH8077>, and the pomp <WH1347> of her strength <WH5797> shall cease <WH7673>; and the mountains <WH2022> of Israel <WH3478> shall be desolate <WH8074>, that none shall pass through <WH5674>.

Then shall they know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>, when I have laid <WH5414> the land <WH776> most <WH4923> desolate <WH8077> because of all their abominations <WH8441> which they have committed <WH6213>.

Also <WH1121>, you son of man <WH120>, the sons <WH1121> of your people <WH5971> still are talking <WH1696> against <WH681> you by the walls <WH7023> and in the doors <WH6607> of the houses <WH1004>, and speak <WH1696> one <WH2297> to another <WH259>, every one <WH376> to his brother <WH251>, saying <WH559>, Come <WH935>, I pray you <WH8085>, and hear what is the word <WH1697> that comes forth <WH3318> from the Lord <WH3068>.

And they come <WH935> unto you as the people <WH5971> comes <WH3996>, and they sit <WH3427> before <WH6440> you as my people <WH5971>, and they hear <WH8085> your words <WH1697>, but they will not do <WH6213> them <WH6310>: for with their mouth they show <WH6213> much love <WH5690>, but their heart <WH3820> goes <WH1980> after <WH310> their covetousness <WH1215>.

And <WH5690>, behold, you are unto them as a very lovely song <WH7892> of one that has a pleasant <WH3303> voice <WH6963>, and can play well <WH2895> on a instrument <WH5059>: for they hear <WH8085> your words <WH1697>, but they do them not <WH6213>.
And when this comes to pass <WH935>, (Behold <WH935>, it will come,) then shall they know <WH3045> that a prophet <WH5030> has been among them <WH8432>.
